ingredients: 1 cup white sugar, 2   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 tablespoon butter, 2 cups pitted sweet cherries, 1 tablespoon white sugar,   +   1/2 cup olive oil, 4  eggs, 1 (6 ounce) container plain yogurt, 1 tablespoon olive oil
nutrition: Total Fat 14g 17%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 65mg 22%, Sodium 229mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 43g 16%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 6g, Vitamin C 2mg 9%, Calcium 89mg 7%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 138mg 3%
